DD!

Introduction


My-B (Korean: 마이비) was a female duo and later a sub-unit of the group Ye-A under Kiroy Company, and later under Shinhoo Entertainment. They consisted of: Dohye and Hyei. They debuted on September 25, 2013. They disbanded in 2014.
